arts.ttl: Serie A: Torino vs. Genoa – Confirmed line-ups and updates
arts.sum: Marco Baroni and Patrick Vieira have made just one change each ahead of the meeting...

The Grifone’s last victory was the 3–1 at Bologna on 24 May. Genoa had not begun a Serie A season without a win in the first seven rounds since 2017/18. Torino are aiming to build on their win against Napoli, while Genoa are chasing their first three points of the season
